name: Landscape Delta(Anime)
description:
Theta Version Model is based mainly on watercolor. The model can render some of character pictures, but is not recommended.

About this model

Welcome to Landscape-Theta, a custom Stable Diffusion model that can generate stunning images of landscapes and scenery. This model is created by me, Celsia, and it is based on previous models:

My Landscape Realistic Pro model(as base)

Anything V5: https://civitai.com/models/9409/or-anything-v5ink

And combined with:

Cloudstyle: https://civitai.com/models/93792/cloud-style

Better Watercolor painting - In the style of Iris Compiet: https://civitai.com/models/79715/better-watercolor-painting-in-the-style-of-iris-compiet

How to use this model

To use this model, you need to have Stable Diffusion installed on your device. You can download it from here: AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui: Stable Diffusion web UI (github.com)

Once you have Stable Diffusion, you can download my model from this page and load it on your device. Then you can start generating images by typing text prompts. For example, “a tropical beach with palm trees”. You can also adjust the parameters of the model to change the quality and diversity of the outputs. For example, you can use upscaler such as Topaz Gigapixel or the Ultra Sharp 4x model to enhance the resolution and sharpness of the images.

Best step count is around 30~50(too less = simple render, too much = too noisy due to reprocessing).

Terms and conditions(Policies)

I’m happy to share this model with you and I hope you enjoy using it. However, I ask you to respect my work and follow these terms and conditions:

  1. You cannot sell the images you have created with these models due to the merged models' rules and policies.

You can do the following things with this model:.

  1. You can use this model’s generations in whatever type of project as a background or a minor part you like even if the project is commercial but you need to give me credit in that case.

  2. YOU DO NOT NEED TO GIVE ME CREDIT TO THIS MODEL WHEN USING THE MODEL TO GENERATE NON-LANDSCAPE ART.

Thank you for understanding and following these policies. I appreciate your support and respect.

Contact and support

If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback about this model, please contact me at ocillus@outlook.com or leave a comment on this page. I would love to hear from you and see your creations.

You can also follow me on Deviantart: @Amber2024 or @Ocillus or @CellyOcillus

Join Landscape-AI-Art Group on Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/landscape-ai-art

This is a friendly and supportive community where you can share your artworks, get tips and advice, and collaborate with other landscape and scenery enthusiasts.

I hope you have fun with this model and create some awesome images. Thank you for choosing Landscape Realistic Pro 1.

NST Department-Celsia
